'''Potato planks''' are a joke [[block]], only present in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===

{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Potato Planks|Axe|hidecopper=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Potato planks generate as part of [[potato village]]s and [[potato mineshaft]]s. Additionally, they generate in [[arboretum]] biome on "park lanes".

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|B2 = Potato Stem
|Output = Potato Planks,4
|ignoreusage=1
}}
